title: 190: Who Are We REALLY Voting For?! + Chris Harrison & Reality Steve Confusion! + Real Housewives Fired! + More!
itunes:title: 190: Who Are We REALLY Voting For?! + Chris Harrison & Reality Steve Confusion! + Real Housewives Fired! + More!
description:
(CW: Presidential Debates & Covid-19 Discussed) The Broads are chatting about all the current pop cultures news and NEWS today! First they discuss the presidential debates and the Covid diagnosis (**The Broads are not journalists/experts and are discussing opinons - please do your own research throughly). Then they dive into current #bachnation news and all the confusing signals Chris Harrison is sending us plus Reality Steve tea! The Broads also chat about the recent firing of two Real Housewives, how they are planning to get Bekah cast as the new OC Housewife, recent celebrity births, the Savage X Fenty fashion show, Hocus Pocus remakes, and much more! 

REGISTER TO VOTE HERE: https://vote.gov/


CHECK TO SEE IF YOU ARE REGISTERED HERE: https://www.vote.org/am-i-registered-to-vote/ 


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS AND THEIR DEALS:

FEALS - Feals.com/CHATTY

THIRD LOVE - Thirdlove.com/CHATTY

TAO CLEAN - TAOclean.com/CHATTY

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/


Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
